definitions.definition: To make uniform ; to make the same throughout.
To carry out a process of uniformization , by which a multiple-valued function on a Riemann surface is converted to a single-valued function.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To make uniform ; to make the same throughout.
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics ) To carry out a process of uniformization , by which a multiple-valued function on a Riemann surface is converted to a single-valued function.
